metadata.title: CVE-2020-12740 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
tcprewrite in Tcpreplay through 4.3.2 has a heap-based buffer over-readduring a get_c operation. The issue is being triggered in the functionget_ipv6_next() at common/get.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12740` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
